SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DiscovererService
Service to handle recursive directory search for distinct filenames with given extension.
GeneratorService
Service to be able to generate random test data for the path discoverer logic.
LogEntity
The data entity to store log items in the database.
LoggerService
Logger service to be able to track which WebApplication got the incoming request on /unique endpoint Also tracking the time of the endpoint call, the request parameters and the result of the PathDiscovery logic.
LogItem
A DTO to return log information in 'user-friendly' format.
LogRepository
Repository to handle logging related database operations.
MainController
Controller class to handle incoming request and accomplish the purpose of the application.
PathDiscovererApplication
 
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for swagger ui.
UniqueRequestParams
DTO to support LogItem DTO's 'user-friendly' format.
